item.title: SQL Snippet: Foreign Keys
item.description: If you have worked with SQL based database, I guess y’all are familiar with usage of foreign keys to manage relationship between tables. Relationship Types Lets dive into a famous example involving book — author connection to gain insight. There are variety of connection between these entities, in a graphical: one to one →an author can write only one book, and a book only have one author. one to many →an author can write multiple books, but book can only have one author.
